verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Those who <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> Are as <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> which <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H4131>moved,<s%> but <S%H3427>abides<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

As the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5439>surrounds<s%> His <S%H5971>people<s%> From <S%H6258>this<s%> <S%H6258>time<s%> forth and <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

For the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> shall not <S%H5117>rest<s%> upon the <S%H1486>land<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> That the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> may not <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> to do <S%H9390>wrong.<s%>
<S%H3190>Do<s%> <S%H3190>good,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to those <S%H2896>who<s%> are <S%H2896>good,<s%> And to those <S%H3477>who<s%> are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in their <S%H3820>hearts.<s%>

But as for those who <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> to their <S%H6128>crooked<s%> <S%H6128>ways,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1980>lead<s%> them away with the <S%H6466>doers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be upon <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
